ValidationRule.description: Force users to populate the Local Name field, depending on specific Tax Agency, Tax Type and Status values.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ), (ISPICKVAL(Local_Name__c, '')), (ISPICKVAL(Tax_Type__c, 'Local/Other') ), (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Tax_Agency__c, 'IRS - INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE')) ), ( (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending PAC Review - New Notice Received'))) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending PAC Review - Additional Notice Received'))) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending PAC Review - Transferring to PAC Service & Support Team'))) ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a value in the Local Name field, when selecting a Tax Type value of Local/Other.
